scripts.build-deposit-api: npm run swagger-gen -- -c ./src/service-wrappers/deposit-api/tsoa.json && npm run routes-gen -- -c ./src/service-wrappers/deposit-api/tsoa.json
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-deposit-api && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json --skipLibCheck
scripts.build-image-deposit-api: cd ../../.. && docker build --build-arg NPM_TOKEN=$NPM_TOKEN -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-deposit-api:$DOCKER_IMAGE_TAG -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-deposit-api:latest -f packages/services/deposit/src/service-wrappers/deposit-api/Dockerfile . && cd packages/services/deposit
scripts.build-image-eth-block-follower: cd ../../.. && docker build --build-arg NPM_TOKEN=$NPM_TOKEN -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-ethereum-block-follower:$DOCKER_IMAGE_TAG -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-ethereum-block-follower:latest -f packages/services/deposit/src/service-wrappers/eth-block-follower/Dockerfile . && cd packages/services/deposit
scripts.build-image-kvt-block-follower: cd ../../.. && docker build --build-arg NPM_TOKEN=$NPM_TOKEN -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-kvt-block-follower:$DOCKER_IMAGE_TAG -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-kvt-block-follower:latest -f packages/services/deposit/src/service-wrappers/kvt-block-follower/Dockerfile . && cd packages/services/deposit
scripts.build-image-kinesis-and-eth-coin-deposit: cd ../../.. && docker build --build-arg NPM_TOKEN=$NPM_TOKEN -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-kinesis-and-eth-coin-deposit-processor:$DOCKER_IMAGE_TAG -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-kinesis-and-eth-coin-deposit-processor:latest -f packages/services/deposit/src/service-wrappers/kinesis-and-eth-coin-deposit-processor/Dockerfile . && cd packages/services/deposit
scripts.build-image-third-party-deposit-processo: cd ../../.. && docker build --build-arg NPM_TOKEN=$NPM_TOKEN -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-third-party-deposit-processor:$DOCKER_IMAGE_TAG -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-third-party-deposit-processor:latest -f packages/services/deposit/src/service-wrappers/third-party-coin-deposit-processor/Dockerfile . && cd packages/services/deposit
scripts.build-image-latest: npm run build-base-image && npm run build-image-deposit-api && npm run build-image-eth-block-follower && npm run build-image-kvt-block-follower && npm run build-image-kinesis-and-eth-coin-deposit-processor && npm run build-image-third-party-deposit-processor
scripts.push-image: npm run push-deposit-api-image && npm run push-eth-block-follower-image && npm run push-kvt-block-follower-image && npm run push-kinesis-and-eth-coin-deposit-processor-image && npm run push-third-party-deposit-processor-image
scripts.deploy-latest-integration:deposit-api: aws ecs update-service --service kbe-int-deposit-api-service-v2 --cluster kbe-int-cluster --region ap-southeast-2
scripts.deploy-latest-integration:kvt-block-foll: aws ecs update-service --service kbe-int-kvt-block-follower-service-v2 --cluster kbe-int-cluster --region ap-southeast-2
scripts.deploy-latest-integration: npm run deploy-latest-integration:deposit-api && npm run deploy-latest-integration:eth-block-follower && npm run deploy-latest-integration:kvt-block-follower && npm run deploy-latest-integration:kinesis-and-eth-coin-deposit-processor && npm run deploy-latest-integration:third-party-deposit-processor
